text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
That was a great race…! 
I got really heated up!!

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
Now that the race is over… 
it's time for the Winning Live!

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
The Winning Live… it's a place where 
the victorious horsegirls and their 
cheering fans can share their joy!

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
The center, where only the first place
winner can stand, is the goal everyone
strives for.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
There are songs that can only be sung 
if you win a special race, or if you 
make a great achievement.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: The emotions you see are deeply moving.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
Plus, there's many people who become 
fans of the horsegirls after watching 
their live performances.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
The Winning Live is an indispensable
element for the horsegirls!

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
Now, then… let's go see the shining
horse girls on stage!
